Welcome to my timeline, the graphical temporal representation of my experiences!

## Academic timeline

```{r load-libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(timevis)

data <- data.frame(
  id      = 1:4,
  content = c("Bocconi Univeristy"  , "Imperial College Business School"  ,"Mannheim University", "London Business School"),
  start   = c("2016-08-23", "2017-07-20", "2018-09-01", "2020-09-02"),
  end     = c("2019-12-05", "2017-08-16", "2018-12-20", NA)
)

timevis(data)

```


## Professional timeline

```{r load-libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(timevis)

data <- data.frame(
  id      = 1:4,
  content = c("Deloitte"  , "Macquarie"  ,"PAI Partners", "Credit Suisse"),
  start   = c("2018-07-02", "2019-06-03", "2019-12-02", "2020-08-12"),
  end     = c("2018-10-31", "2019-09-02", "2020-30-06", NA)
)

timevis(data)

```
